flawed_nl_solution:
900 x 3/4 = <<900*3/4=675.0>>675.0 people came before the start of the concert.
900 - 675.0 = <<900-675.0=225.0>>225.0 people did not come before the start of the concert.
225.0 x 5/9 = <<225.0*5/9=125.0>>125.0 people came few minutes after the first song.
So, 125.0 + 80 = <<125.0+80=205.0>>205.0 people came to the concert that was not able to be at the start of the concert.
Therefore, 225.0 - 205.0 = <<225.0-205.0=24.0>>24.0 people did not go to the concert.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20.0, not 24.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
